channel.title: Art on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in Art on lavafroth

item.title: Nix Chan - Redraw
item.description: The waifu NixOS users deserve. Fun fact, this is a redraw after my dad (real artist btw) told me that the original piece had the anatomy messed up. Enjoy!

item.title: WIP Animation
item.description: A little *work in progress* animation trying to emulate realistic motions. Thank you Polina Tankilevitch for the reference video.

item.title: Netrunner
item.description: This piece takes heavy inspiration from Mirror’s Edge, Cyberpunk Edgerunners, Ergo Proxy and the like, things that gave me a sense of the term Netrunner.

item.title: Truce
item.description: A painting of the lead vocalist of Twenty Øne Piløts, named after one of my favorite songs from their album Vessel.

item.title: She's a Rebel
item.description: Clearly the title was an afterthought.
